information: Malavé Moreno is a spanish company located in Andalusia, Condado de Huelva. We offer you the best Iberian hams and sausages of outstanding quality. Our Iberian pigs are bred in the open range and fed with natural resources of the pasture: acorns, grasses and herbs. You can choose between different qualities of ham: Limited Edition, Great Selection, Cotidiano, Cebo and Recebo.Our Limited Edition was honored with the "3 Stars Superior Taste Award 2010" by the ITQI in Brussels.In the moment we export to UK, Germany and the Benelux countries.
